Comment: A unique ID number for the price record.
The Debtor account that the price rule is defined for. Has the value -1 if the price rule belongs to a generic price policy.
If the price rule is defined for an individual Stock item, this field stores the item's stockcode.
The substitute price to be applied to the stockcode/group.
Date from which the price rule is active.
Date to which the price rule remains active.
Minimum quantity for the price rule to apply.
The Debtors Account Group that the price rule belongs to.
If the price rule is defined against a price group rather than an individual product, this field stores the Stock price group.
The percentage discount to be applied, as per a price rule.
The Debtor price policy that the price rule belongs to.
Switch to this base sell price band (generally set if no discount/substitute price is applied).
ID number of the master job that this price rule applies to, if relevant.
ID number of the job that this price rule applies to, if relevant.
ID number of the campaign wave that this price rule applies to, if relevant.
